TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar/StatusBarPanelCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的面板集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of panels in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存在面板中顯示。The class stores the panels displayed in the . 集合中的每個物件是的執行個體類別定義的顯示特性和行為中所顯示的面板。Each object in the collection is an instance of the class which defines the display characteristics and behaviors of a panel displayed in a . 有數種方式將面板加入至集合。There are a number of ways to add panels to the collection. 方法可讓您將單一面板加入至集合。The method provides the ability to add a single panel to the collection. 若要加入集合中的面板數，您建立的陣列物件，並將它指派給方法。To add a number of panels to the collection, you create an array of objects and assign it to the method. 如果您想要插入集合內的特定位置中的面板，您可以使用方法。If you want to insert a panel at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除面板，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道面板位於集合。To remove panels, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the panel is located within the collection. 方法可讓您從而不是使用集合中移除所有面板方法一次都移除單一面板。The method enables you to remove all panels from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single panel at a time. 除了方法和屬性加入和移除面板也提供方法來尋找集合中的面板。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing panels, the also provides methods to find panels within the collection. 方法可讓您決定面板是否為集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道面板會位在集合內，您可以使用方法，以判斷其中面板是位在集合內。Once you know that the panel is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the panel is located within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。One of the , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用和屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將面板加入控制項來顯示多個類型的資訊。You can add panels to a control to display more than one type of information. 這個版本的方法建立新中指定的文字與`text`參數並將它加入至集合。This version of the method creates a new with the text specified in the `text` parameter and adds it to collection. 順序中的面板位於表示面板內顯示的順序控制項。The order in which panels are located in the represents the order that panels are displayed within the control. 集合中的第一個面板開始由左至右，從左邊顯示的面板。Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection. 屬性控制項不會變更面板中的顯示的順序。The property of the control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the . 若要插入集合中特定位置的面板，請使用方法。To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the method. 若要在單一作業中的集合中加入面板的一組，使用方法。To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您從集合移除的面板時，後續的面板集合中索引將會變更。When you remove a panel from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent panels in the collection. [移除] 面板的所有資訊將會都刪除。All information about the removed panel is deleted. 您可以使用這個方法來指定要從集合移除面板的索引，然後從清單中移除的特定面板。You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the list by specifying the index of the panel to remove from the collection. 若要指定要移除而不是要在面板的索引面板，請使用方法。To specify the panel to remove instead of the index to the panel, use the method. 若要移除所有面板從控制，請使用方法。To remove all panels from the control, use the method.

exception.span: 參數小於零，或者大於等於 類別的 屬性值。

span.span: The parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
